text: Hey Kevin — Looks like the `name` key can only include underscores. So it you need `primary_extra` vs `primary-extra`

As Pieter alluded to as well — `alternate_names` is a protected attribute that can only have a handful of values. It allows existing themes to map their fields to meet marketplace requirements. More details can be found here <https://arc.net/l/quote/rulbkuve>
